snippet: Georgia Tech fired defensive coordinator Al Groh on Monday, hoping a change will save what has been a hugely disappointing season.
abstract: Georgia Tech fires defensive coordinator Al Groh, hoping a change will save what has been a hugely disappointing football season.
lead_paragraph: Georgia Tech fired defensive coordinator Al Groh on Monday, hoping a change will save what has been a hugely disappointing season.

headline.seo: Georgia Tech Fires Defensive Coordinator Al Groh
headline.main: Georgia Tech Fires Defensive Coordinator Groh
